data.name: AWS Community Day Tel Aviv 2019
data.description:
AWS Community Day Tel Aviv is a free full-day event dedicated to AWS User Groups and Meet Ups, “for the community, by the community.” Showcasing some of our local community speakers, influencers and innovators.


This event aims to inspire, educate and bring the developer and IT …
